name: LinearTrueDistributor
description: LinearTrueDistributor. Distributor contract which uses a linear distribution Contracts are registered to receive distributions. Once registered, a farm contract can claim TRU from the distributor. - Distributions are based on time. - Owner can withdraw funds in case distribution need to be re-allocated. Distribute TRU in a linear fashion.

eventDecorators.name: Distributed
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the work extra gas amount is changed.

eventDecorators.name: FarmChanged
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the work extra gas amount is changed.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the work extra gas amount is changed.

eventDecorators.name: TotalAmountChanged
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the work extra gas amount is changed.

functionDecorators.name: distribute
functionDecorators.description: Distribute tokens to farm in linear fashion based on time.

functionDecorators.name: empty
functionDecorators.description: Withdraw funds (for instance if owner decides to create a new distribution) Distributes remaining funds before withdrwaing.

returnDecorators.description: amount of tokens for next distribution.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: setDailyDistribution
functionDecorators.description: Change amount of tokens distributed daily by changing total distributed amount.

functionDecorators.name: setFarm
functionDecorators.description: Set contract to receive distributions Will distribute to previous contract if farm already exists.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
